titleInfo.title: Bernstein's Dry Goods Store in Walsenburg, Colorado

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''# 149 Bernstein's Store, Walsenberg [sic], Co c. 1890''. On back of photograph: ''Bernstein's Store, Walsenberg [sic] Colo. 1889-1890 approx. Moritz Bernstein standing with hand on counter Donor Mr. Morton Stark #149''.

mods.abstract: Interior of Moritz Bernstein's Dry Goods Store in Walsenburg, Colorado. The owner, Moritz Bernstein, stands with his hand on the counter to the right.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
